論.definition: opinion; view; theory; doctrine; to discuss; to talk about; to regard; to consider; per; by the (kilometer, hour etc)

論功.definition: to evaluate the merit of sth

論及.definition: to make reference to; to mention

論定.definition: to make a definitive judgment; to come to a firm conclusion

論文.definition: paper; treatise; thesis; CL:篇[pian1]; to discuss a paper or thesis (old)

論斷.definition: to infer; to judge; inference; judgment; conclusion

論理.definition: normally; as things should be; by rights; to reason things out; logic

論語.definition: The Analects of Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]

論證.definition: to prove a point; to expound on; to demonstrate or prove (through argument); proof

論長道短.definition: lit. to discuss sb's merits and demerits (idiom); to gossip

論點.definition: argument; line of reasoning; thesis; point (of discussion)
